Subject: Trouble in the BlackFortress.

DarkMouse::

She scrambled to get the autoguns ready.  She singled out the 
intruder's signature and locked on. "He's the one not being chased. 
Figures because the intruder is doing the chasing. I hope Chameleon 
will be ok. KitKat3, Darkfate and Drillbit will handle them. But I'm 
not taking chances, I'll keep them backed up from here." 

She finished her scans of all the bots in the fortress. "Hmmm, that's 
odd.  KitKat's scan signature is only a half a millipulse off.  Hmm, 
I guess she's just over tired. Poor kid, dealing with coming back to 
life, having," she grimaced,"Mr.Lovey Dovey to put up with and then 
all this. Dang, she's a better bot than I. But then, I went through 
it too, so oh well."  She hurried through her systems and kept on 
with the back up with the autoguns, but kept them at manual control.
